Author: Tony Stark#4609
Vanncoins#3044
Content: If the app is closed during a swap, will the swap fail?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @antropov083 what is your internet speed? 3g/4g/wifi? are you using VPN?

Author: Tony Stark#4609
Content: @SHossain @ca333 this google play  " clear the cache" stuff seems to be widespread, it might be good to pin a message about it!

Author: ca333#0118
Content: @Vanncoins on android no. On iOS it wont immeditely fail but it wont execute (finish) the swap if the app isn't kept open. So if you keep it closed too long the swap will eventually timeout (fail).

Content: @SHossain 4g

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: are you using VPN?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: sometimes some IPs are blocked in Russia

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: also, if you have VPN, you can try with that

Content: your 4G speed is faster than mine for sure
